lazytest: Runs Only Failing Tests

Source: R/lazytest-package.R
lazytest-package.Rd

A companion package to the testthat package that saves development time by helping you rerun only the tests that have failed during the last run.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/krlmlr/lazytest

  • https://krlmlr.github.io/lazytest

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/krlmlr/lazytest/issues
